mapper.select: select a.q_c_no, a.userid, a.q_no, a.q_comment, b.m_pic, to_char(a.writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') writedate, to_char(a.editdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') editdate from qna_comment a join register b on a.userid=b.userid where q_no=#{q_no} order by a.q_c_no
mapper.insert: insert into qna_comment(q_c_no, userid, q_comment, q_no) values(qna_comment_sq.nextval, #{userid}, #{q_comment}, #{q_no})
mapper.update: update qna_comment set q_comment=#{q_comment}, editdate=sysdate where q_c_no=#{q_c_no}
